name: Rescue Operation (itch)
description:
A terrorist organisation has been discovered to be operating from a shipping depot selling arms and other illicit goods on the international black market. 

Your mission is to enter the site and take out the hostiles. Caution when engaging is advised.  It is to be noted that they have taken hostages. 

MOUSE 1 to SHOOT. 

MOUSE 2 to RELOAD.
